title: All we know about innovation in food and agriculture

tasks.task: Engage in Agricultural Innovation and System Transformation
subtasks: Highlight the necessity of improved efficiency
Acknowledge current challenges in food access (undernourishment, malnutrition, obesity)
Emphasize the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on food systems
Discuss the role of innovation in agri-food systems transformation
Promote digital technologies in agriculture (e.g., online platforms, precision agriculture, AI)
Advocate for bridging the digital divide among small producers
Encourage public investments in rural connectivity and digital literacy
Support farmer registration in digital databases and policy frameworks
Highlight the importance of inclusive business models (e.g., contract farming)
Promote geographic indicators for food products to improve market access
Highlight the role of online agriculture worker platforms in responding to crises
Stress the significance of women and youth in agri-food innovations
Advocate for public-private partnerships to facilitate smallholder participation in digital economy
Cite examples of successful pilot projects (e.g., EZOKO Digital, SMS services in Peru)
Emphasize the potential for accelerated innovation in response to COVID-19 and its role in achieving inclusiveness and sustainability
